name: CreateAwsCurConfig
description:
Create an AWS CUR config for Cloud Cost Management.

Use this tool to create a Cloud Cost Management account for an AWS Cost and Usage Report (CUR) configuration.

parameters.name: aws_cur_config_type
parameters.description: Type of AWS CUR config post request. Choose from available options: 'aws_cur_config_post_request'.

value_schema.description: Type of AWS CUR config Post Request.

parameters.name: excluded_aws_account_ids
parameters.description: List of AWS account IDs to exclude from the billing dataset. Used when `include_new_accounts` is `true`.

value_schema.description: The AWS account IDs to be excluded from your billing dataset. This field is used when `include_new_accounts` is `true`.

parameters.name: included_aws_account_ids
parameters.description: List of AWS account IDs to be included in the billing dataset, used when `include_new_accounts` is `false`.

value_schema.description: The AWS account IDs to be included in your billing dataset. This field is used when `include_new_accounts` is `false`.

parameters.name: aws_account_id
parameters.description: The AWS account ID for which the CUR config is created. This is required to specify which AWS account the configuration applies to.

value_schema.description: The AWS account ID.

parameters.name: aws_bucket_name_for_cur
parameters.description: The AWS bucket name used to store the Cost and Usage Report.

value_schema.description: The AWS bucket name used to store the Cost and Usage Report.

parameters.name: bucket_region
parameters.description: The AWS region where the bucket is located.

value_schema.description: The region the bucket is located in.

parameters.name: report_month
parameters.description: Specify the month for the AWS Cost and Usage Report. Use an integer (1-12) to represent the month.

value_schema.description: The month of the report.

parameters.name: report_name
parameters.description: The name of the Cost and Usage Report to create for AWS CUR configuration.

value_schema.description: The name of the Cost and Usage Report.

parameters.name: report_prefix
parameters.description: The prefix for the Cost and Usage Report (CUR).

value_schema.description: The report prefix used for the Cost and Usage Report.

parameters.name: include_new_member_accounts
parameters.description: Set to true to automatically include new member accounts by default in your billing dataset.

value_schema.description: Whether or not to automatically include new member accounts by default in your billing dataset.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.account_filters.excluded_accounts
parameters.description: The AWS account IDs to be excluded from your billing dataset. This field is used when `include_new_accounts` is `true`.

value_schema.description: The AWS account IDs to be excluded from your billing dataset. This field is used when `include_new_accounts` is `true`.

parameters.name: data.attributes.account_filters.include_new_accounts
parameters.description: Whether or not to automatically include new member accounts by default in your billing dataset.

value_schema.description: Whether or not to automatically include new member accounts by default in your billing dataset.

parameters.name: data.attributes.account_filters.included_accounts
parameters.description: The AWS account IDs to be included in your billing dataset. This field is used when `include_new_accounts` is `false`.

value_schema.description: The AWS account IDs to be included in your billing dataset. This field is used when `include_new_accounts` is `false`.

parameters.name: data.attributes.account_id
parameters.description: The AWS account ID.

value_schema.description: The AWS account ID.

parameters.name: data.attributes.bucket_name
parameters.description: The AWS bucket name used to store the Cost and Usage Report.

value_schema.description: The AWS bucket name used to store the Cost and Usage Report.

parameters.name: data.attributes.bucket_region
parameters.description: The region the bucket is located in.

value_schema.description: The region the bucket is located in.

parameters.name: data.attributes.months
parameters.description: The month of the report.

value_schema.description: The month of the report.

parameters.name: data.attributes.report_name
parameters.description: The name of the Cost and Usage Report.

value_schema.description: The name of the Cost and Usage Report.

parameters.name: data.attributes.report_prefix
parameters.description: The report prefix used for the Cost and Usage Report.

value_schema.description: The report prefix used for the Cost and Usage Report.

parameters.name: data.type
parameters.description: Type of AWS CUR config Post Request.

value_schema.description: Type of AWS CUR config Post Request.
